Posts.Content: Nov 15, 2010 12:27AM roslynzs wrote: Hi, I'm a newbie here also.  I'm currently living overseas with my husband for work, and I developed some lumps.  Had a thermogram and sonogram and was told I should have a biopsy.  The medical care isn't the best where I live, so I flew to Singapore for my biopsy.  I thought it would be a needle biopsy, but it was surgical.  I have been waiting two days and don't know how many more.  The waiting is just awful.  Nothing is taking my mind off of it for more than 30 minutes at a time.  I think my mind is in a constant loop until I hear.  And I will get a call because the doctor is far away.  I'm so worried for my husband, we just lost his sister two months ago to cancer.
Posts.Title: Newbie here, waiting on biopsy results iaksma slcst12
